item.description:
THIS EVENT HAS BEEN CANCELLED DUE TO ILLNESS


Knitting potluck at Denise's apartment! Come and knit and help knit flowers for Denise's wedding if you feel like it! If not, work on your own projects! Bring a dish, I'll take care of pizza and salad! Email me for directions and a phone number in case you get lost, if you want to come!

Denise
item.name: CANCELLED _ Knitting Potluck at Denise's
